text: The 1995 UEFA European Under-16 Championship was the 13th edition of UEFA's European Under-16 Football Championship. Belgium hosted the championship, during April 24 – May 6, 1995. 16 teams entered the competition, and Portugal defeated Spain in the final to win the competition for the second time. ==Squads==
